content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
The following framework of regulations ensures that the entire internal system is built in full alignment with the positive legal provisions in force and provides a legal and regulatory decision-making system.
 
  • Regulation on equal treatment and non-discrimination policies;
  • Reregulating on the organization of elections for the authorities and governing bodies at Tempulli;
  • Regulation on organization and systematization of working places;
  • Regulation on managing council activity;
  • Regulation “on the organization and functioning of the academic council”;
  • Regulation on the work of the teaching and scientific committee;
  • Ethical code (disciplinary procedure, academic and administrative personnel);
  • Pre-contract for employment;
  • Statement;
  • Regulation about definition, objectives for the program, work – study;
  • Regulation about election procedure for teaching title;
  • Regulatory framework for quality assurance and management;
  • Regulation about surveys and evaluations;
  • Performance assessment regulation;
  • Communication regulation;
  • Mobility regulation for students and staff;
  • Regulation of the bachelor program;
  • Regulation of the study program “Master”;
  • Manual for the diploma theme work - bachelor and master;
  • Regulation on the determination of tuition fees and other fees;
  • Regulation for student council;
  • Regulation for transfer of students;
  • Regulation on scholarships allocation;
  • Regulation for career center;
  • Manual for internships for students;
  • Prohibition of smoking trends in Tempulli premises;
  • Regulation on fire protection;
  • Clothing code;
  • Regulation on the Library;
  • Project regulation;
  • Regulation on the archive;
  • CP regulation.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]
The book of regulations

 [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text] Korniza e mëposhtme e rregullorëve siguron që i gjithë sistemi i brendshëm të ndërtohet në përputhje të plote me dispozitat ligjore të cilat janë në fuqi dhe të sigurojnë një sistem të vendimmarrjes ligjore dhe rregullative.   Rregullorja për trajtimin e barabartë dhe politikat e mosdiskriminimit; Riorganizimi dhe organizimi i zgjedhjeve për autoritetet dhe […]
